info.title: Search Service API
info.description: SPI middleware component: provides search services to the GraphQL API.

get.description: Returns a single learning provider, based on its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the learning provider to return.

parameters.name: X-Internal-Request-Id
parameters.description: An internal request id. Should be a vaild guid.

parameters.name: X-External-Request-Id
parameters.description: An optional external request id. Used in logging.

200.description: The learning provider exists, and is part of the body of the response.

404.description: No learning provider exists for the given id.

get.description: Standard diagnostics method, used to test the health of the facade's underlying system.

200.description: The standard/only response from the method.

message.example: Could not find a learning provider for id 12345.

statusCode.description: The status code thrown with the error.
